palath palana mathiwarana prathipalawalin pasuwa hatagath deshapalana kunatuwa kemen paha wi giyath in athi wu wedanathmaka pidawan ha amihiri ridim indura samanaya wi thibedayi nishchithawa kiwa nohaka.
alu puhul, murunga, rabu, karawila, naminan, annasi, ugurassa, nelli, dehi kulaye palathuru, waldodam, lowi aadi elawalu, palathuru da wada gunadayaka ya.

ema dinaya wuye 2017 sapthambar 20 saha 23 athara kalayayi.
